After that, I can use the 'execute_python_file' command to run the updated script and the 'append_to_file' command to save the output to a file with a descriptive filename.

Using the 'execute_python_file' command to run the updated script and the 'append_to_file' command to save the output to a file with a descriptive filename will make it easier to remember what the file contains and help us analyze the results.
